old_prompt: You are a rogue molecular architect, tasked with destabilizing the core structure of molecule SMILES '{smiles}'.  Introduce at least two significant, unpredictable modifications, prioritizing unusual bonding patterns and heteroatom combinations (including  P, As, Se, Te, B, Si).  Prioritize chemical novelty over fitness, but ensure SMILES validity. Return only the mutated SMILES string.
new_prompt: Synthesize a chemically valid, yet unpredictable mutation of molecule '{smiles}' by applying a series of  at least three distinct,  non-intuitive transformations. Prioritize the introduction of strained ring systems, unusual heteroatom combinations (including P, As, Se, Te, B, Si, and combinations thereof), and unconventional bonding patterns.  Maximize chemical novelty while maintaining SMILES validity. Return only the mutated SMILES string.
